title: AIenabled
extract: Artificial intelligence (AI) is an umbrella term for “smart” technologies that are aware of and can learn from their environments, enabling them to subsequently take autonomous action. ... Forms of AI in use today include, among others, digital assistants, chatbots and machine learning.Jan 22, 2018
